Question: The campaigns of this person and Lazio, along with Giuliani's initial effort, spent a record combined $90 million.
Hints: This person said she did not want to leave the Senate, but that the new position represented a "difficult and exciting adventure".
This person spent $36 million for her reelection, more than any other candidate for Senate in the 2006 elections did.
This person traveled to 79 countries during this time, breaking the mark for most-traveled First Lady held by Pat Nixon.
